comment: I have taken her online class twice, failed the first time and got a D the second time. Her online lectures are very dry and hard for me to follow.  I would advise taking it in class.  I took in in class with another professor and earned an A.

Prof Sheil is passionate about accounting. She has much experience and knowledge and gives you real-life examples. She teaches from the minute class starts to the minute class ends, dont expect to get out early. She prepares you for the tests, which arent incredibly difficult. There are a lot of hmwk and quizzes, but theyre easy.

She's about as passionate as one can get about accounting.  She knows the stuff very well. However her lectures don't tend to follow the powerpoints, so she's better for someone who can pay attention well in class.  She's pretty old-fashioned in that she doesn't let you use laptops in class.  Her tests are pretty easy though.

3 tests & weekly chapter quizzes and homework assignments. sit up front, she always starts on time and keeps you to the end of class. Confusing subject at first but if you study and perhaps re-write your notes it's easier to pick up on. hardly uses powerpoints (except for the first few weeks). Class out of 1000 points but she gives about 36 extra

Acct is hard, but this is SO hard.  Twice a week is not enough meeting time to learn the material.  Too much is self taught.  If you miss a class, you will probably fail the next test because you will be so far behind for the new material.  I was ill and missed a week and fell so far behind.  she doesn't care.  I failed the class.

I loved this class! She is a very organized professor and I love her teaching style. She begins class exactly on time but she is lenient with late-comers. Get a seat in the front, she makes the subject matter interesting and easy to understand! Homework is straight-forward, tests are multiple choice and doable. I recommend taking her class!!

Prof. Sheil is an excellent professor, she is very clear on what you need to do to make (insert desired grade). Her lecturing i found to be incredibly helpful, it is not the most exciting subject, but you can tell she is enjoys it and knows the material very well. Tests make up almost the entire grade which I did well on. Study quizzes attend class

The material is hard in general, but prof. Sheil is a great instructor and is always willing to answer questions. It is a very time consuming class,the tests are difficult, but the hw and quizzes are online. She is very clear in what you need to know. Would definitely take her again, but hated the subject. Going to class is crucial, in my opinion.

Maybe if I had the class in person it may have been better, but the online class is horrible. I had no clue what to do. If you can teach yourself stuff, then this is your class. I never met the lady in person, but she was rude through email. She will always find something wrong with your discussion post to not get the full points listed.

This class is super time consuming!!!!! But considering the information you need to know she makes it easy and clear! Great teacher and knows her stuff but you need to work for your grade! Hw takes FOREVER & is never on tests but the quiz questions are so know that stuff. Id take her again because I learned a lot but just know it is a lot of work.
Read. Do the multiple choice videos. I prolly would've done better if I had. Study, study, study

The class was pretty tough but mainly because of the material. Everything done on Connect, the homework can be quite time consuming. The only thing I dislike about this professor is that she takes points off for the smallest things when it comes to discussions and the extra credit syllabus assignment.

She is amazing! The subject matter is hard but she is always willing to guide you to the right answer. I missed the "syllabus scavenger hunt" at the very beginning of the semester because the syllabus was 34 pages long and she doesn't use the dropbox function in D2L, which cost me an A in the class. So beware of small assignments like that.

This class is a hard class. You have to pay attention to her lectures. The homework wasnt that bad because you can check your answers before submitting. But the quizzes can be some what difficult. The tests are a great amount of the final grade and can be difficult as well. You the quizzes to study for the tests. She is a sweet lady but hard class.

Overall, a great professor to take. I rarely used the textbook, but it did come in handy. Attending her lectures is definitely recommended in order to do well! Make sure that you do the online homework and quizzes, as they make you prepared for the exams.

Prof. Sheil is very passionate about what she does. Attending class is not specifically mandatory, but going every day will ensure that you get a good grade. She explains everything to a T and is very clear about what she teaches. Homework and quizzes are harder than exams, but exams make up 95% of your grade. Great teacher!
Extremely boring; wouldn't recommend her. Grades fairly... make sure to do quizzes and online homework on time.

Prof. Sheil is a GREAT professor.  I don't care too much about accounting, but she explains everything thoroughly. She has a genuine interest in the subject, and reflects that through her teaching. I didn't use the textbook once. Online PowerPoints were very helpful.  Tests were easier than quizzes and homework. I'd definitely take her again.

All sections of this class are held to the same homework and exams, so you may as well take the clearest professor at KSU. She makes difficult topics understandable. She has upper-level real world accounting experience. I am not always a "nice" RMP reviewer, but she is awesome. Go to class, do the quizzes and homework, and it is an easy A.

She is an awesome professor. She comes off as very intimidating, overbearing, and strict the first day/week, but DON'T DROP! She makes class time all about the material to be covered, from beginning to end. She is willing to help students who don't understand, and is very clear throughout her lessons. If you go to class and listen, you'll get an A.

Professor Sheil is a very no nonsense professor. She starts promptly at class time and runs to the very end. She has a set agenda and sticks to it. I found the material to be very straight forward and easy to comprehend. Professor Sheil goes to great lengths to make sure she is clear in her explanations.
Awesome prof! Explains everything clearly. Online weekly hw and quizzes through Connect help you learn the material that will be on tests. I would take her again if I had the opportunity.

Professor Sheil is awesome. Best professor for Acct 2100 she explains everything and makes sure she covers everything on reviews prior to tests. There is a lot of work with quizzes and homework, but it is all worth it. She does weekly reviews and goes over missed questions from weekly quizzes. Best professor I've had at KSU.

She is not very approachable. Has a dry personality and asking for help was difficult since she was always rushing through the explanation. She does knows her stuff. Very prompt on posting grades. Homework and quizzes are online in "Connect." One try per quiz and many tries on homework until you get it all right. 2 exams 1 accumulative final.

Awesome professor! She really knows her stuff. Go slowly through the homework to make sure you fully understand it. Don't be afraid to ask questions!! The tests are exactly what you learn - no surprises.

I really enjoyed her class! I was not interested in acct at all, but she made it clear and relevant. Homework and quiz once a week, 2 tests, and 1 final. She seems to really care if her students succeed. Able to clearly explain, understands the level students are coming in on. I started using the book, but then just read powerpoints and got an A!

She is a very helpful professor. She makes sure that everyone in the class understands the material before moving on to something else. This class is pretty good if you are just trying to have an easy class as a buffer. It's a little easier if you've taken accounting classes before hand. Only 1 hw assignment per week and 1 test, both online.

LOVED HER!... she does know her stuff and will go at a fast pace, but she is more than willing to slow down if you JUST ASK..homework can take a while to do..BUT most of her test questions come from her quiz question..AND the final, is almost a copy paste version of the first two test.. I would take her again if i could!!

An okay teacher. Homework WILL take you at least a day to complete.Tests are somewhat confusing and contradicts what you learn in the book. It was rare you got straight forward help from her about HW through the week. She does give examples of how to work quiz and test problems you might have missed. Not an easy A but you do learn a lot.

Difficult professor. Lectures are pretty boring but she does explain everything. The way she explains is dry, so for those who hate accounting find a different professor. HW is generally a pain but does help. No study=no pass with this one

Prof. Sheil definitely knows everything about accounting and gives good examples to help understand the material. However, the homework takes hours and test questions are very contradicting. Going into the test I thought I knew all of the material but always got a C or a low B. Not an easy A. Only three tests. She does give extra credit.

More than likely the best accounting professor that KSU has to offer. This lady is extremely intelligent you all and has extensive experience with several big name accounting firms. She will also tell you real life stories of her personal career which are very interesting and support and reinforce the material being taught at hand. RECOMMENDED!!!!!

One of the best professors at KSU! She makes you work for your grades, but if you are a hardworking person you will succeed in her class. Her quiz questions are repeated on exams. The exams always have extra questions, for extra points. If you have a question she is happy to answer it. Not a hard A.

Excellent professor!! Definitely the best prof. I have had!! She repeats everything a lot and makes sure students understand the material. She gives online quizzes that are almost identical to many test questions so they really prepare you. She posts test grades the same day you take the test. I would definitely take her again!!

She is a great professor who truly shows interest in making sure her students understand the material. Course workload is difficult but Prof. Sheil does a great job of explaining and making the material more clear. Do the homework and online quizzes and tests are much easier.

Mrs. Sheil used a powerpoint at first and it was just like every other professor, but halfway into the semester she stopped using the powerpoint and everyone started doing much better and class became much more exciting. Overall great teacher, very knowledgeable. Show up to class do the homework and you will get an "A".

Prof. Sheil is a great knowledgeable professor(KSU is lacking those these days). She knows her stuff and has lots of workplace accounting experience. She has worked in some very cool places and has good accounting stories. Homework every week due Sunday as well as quizzes. 3 tests. If you have to take ACCT then Prof Sheil is the way to go.

Prof. Sheil is a great teacher and knows her subject well. She moves fast but makes sure everyone understands before moving forward. She does not take any nonsense in class and may appear rude but she cares for her students. Online homework was difficult but helps you understand the subject better. Tests are not too bad. Stay on top for an easy A.

She obviously understood what she was talking about but couldn't relay it to the class in a way they would understand. From day one, she only spoke in accounting terms, so if you don't know the lingo, don't take her class. She came off as slightly pretentious to those who asked questions.

Teacher definitely knows what she is teaching. She does try so hard to help you get this boring stuff. It is a lot of work. Hmwk is hard and long. Online quizzes are short timed and weigh heavily. Couldn't ask questions in class. Good luck taking her class. "Sink or Swim!!" Very frustrating! You WILL need tutoring!

Definitely hard, but worth it. She knows what she's talking about. Do all of the online quizzes and homework. It helps your grade A LOT. Go to the accounting lab for homework and don't wait until the last day because she puts a lot on one question. Test can be worded weird, but take practice quizzes and you'll be ok. Go to Reviews!!!

She is AMAZING! She explains everything clear and makes sure everyone understands. HW is a bit difficult but the exams are not that hard and they are the same no matter who you take. I am an international student and took this class for my first semester but I had no problem understanding this material. If you are an accounting major, take her!

The worst professor I've ever had this misfortune of having. Visibly agitated by questions and comments in class. Downright rude and mean to people who seek help outside of class. Does not explain basic concepts, rather gives specific examples and expects you to figure out the concepts yourself. The worst of the worst.

She knows a lot about her subject, but when you hear her explaining it you feel like you're in a Peanuts TV special. She doesn't answer questions well, doesn't explain things clearly, and has a very sink-or-swim attitude. If you don't catch on immediately, you're left in the dust.

Makes accounting alot harder than it is. She knows alot but is not good at teaching it. Very hard to learn by listening to her lecture. HW and Quizzes are online and they are very confusing and give you little practice. Tests are pretty confusing at times, and final is cumlative. Very cut-throat with grades.

This class is not hard if you take the time to study it. There are a total of 3 test that make up your grade and online hw and quizzes every week. If you do your online hw and quizzes on time and understand the material you are guarantee a B. Its possible to get an A. U will teach yourself everything in this class. Take her if you want to learn.

This teacher is hard. Oh and good luck with asking questions because she will make you feel dumb. Homework vs. quizzes are totally different and confusing. I would not advise you to take this class. The previous good comments is a bunch of BULL! Don't take this professor!
MISERABLE PROFESSOR, MISERABLE CLASS, MISERABLE SCHOOL. THE WORST OF THE WORST!

Knows accounting well, but failure as a prof.  Abrasive, visibly annoyed by questions. Arrogant and makes class overly difficult. Occasionally unprepared for class.  Uses examples out of book only. Text is incoherent, so must go to class for notes. Only contactable by email, slow to respond.  Take another section!

She knows her stuff! She goes really fast but gives you a chance to ask her to clarify and does not mind doing so at all!! You just have to SPEAK UP! Don't sit in the back of class - she talks kind of quiet. I NEVER use my book - only notes. Love her as a teacher! My highest grade is in this class and it is the one I was most worried about.

She knows her stuff but goes over so quickly that you can't even take notes.  She would be better if she posted the sample-problems she is gonna use in class beforehand at least to have the opportunity to print them out and avoid taking so much worthless notes during class and missing the whole point.  She is a bit boring-well accounting is boring

I would not take this professor if I was you. Not studying and getting an A. That's very rare. An A student told me that she had to memorize the book to get an A/B. I studied A LOT and actually did worse than I did on the first test which I didn't study much for. Her reviews are of no help. She is a bit lazy about her materials. Quick with grading.

Excellent teacher. Explains crystal clear and knows the subject. Very helpful and always explaining in more than one way for those who did not understand easily. Class is not easy, but if you attend and study the HW and online quiz as well as the additional help online for the book you will get an easy A. Review before each exam very helpful.
GREAT professor. She thoroughly explains the material in a manner that make sense. I've had no trouble catching on - but you HAVE to attend class and pay attention!
Take her!!! attend class, ask questions and study and you will make a good great but also learn something along the way
She makes everything very clear and is very good at simplifying thinsgs

Great prof! She explains everything very clearly and makes sure that EVERYONE understands. I will definitly get an A in the class and I barely ever study. I would suggest going to every class and doing all homework and quizzes. She is awesome and made me confident in my decision to major in accounting.

Prof. Sheil is AMAZING!!!! She is one of the best professors I've had at KSU. Acct is a hard class but she does everything she can to help you understand! I got an A and it wasn't too hard. TAKE HER if you want to pass with a good grade!

SHE IS AWESOME!!! take her! she will help you understand the material... the class is a little boring, but hey, accounting is boring. but all in all she is GREAT and i will definitely get an A and so will the majority of the class, which is always a good sign. : ) take her!
No Comments
She is a quality minded, fair teacher. She puts forth a lot of effort to make sure that her students are "getting it." I highly recommend this teacher if you want to learn Accounting.

Wonderful teacher. One of the best I've had. She uses class time very efficiently, does frequent review, and presents the information in a way that is easily digestible, There is a lot of homework to do but it will help you immensely and it is not that difficult. You will actually use your book. TAKE HER
I Hate accouting but she made it easy to understand! Do your homework and quizes and it will boost your grade ALOT! Loved her!
Explains new material very clearly. Everything is summurized, nothing redundant.
Terrible teacher, smart but cannot pass that information to the students in an understandable manner.  GO BACK TO GEORGIA PACIFIC!!!
Good teaching ability, will demonstrate on the board a lot, does not just depend on slides
EASY as long as you study the powerpont slides for the test, you will be fine.

Mrs. Sheil is the greatest.  At first I didnâ€™t like her, and then she loosened up after the first test.  As long as you study the power points you will do fine on the test.  Homework is pointless, but if you do it, it will boost your grade. Plus she give lots of extra credit to help out. GREAT TEACHER.
She teaches from the powerpoint. Homework is required. The tests and quizzes are nothing like the homweork, so you really don't know what to study.
She teaches from power points and doesn't explain the material in depth.

She is a great teacher, and knows the subject well.  She will help you if you ask but if you don't ask don't expect any help.  She also gave us a bonus test at the end of the semester which gave me the extra points i needed to make an A in the class.  Definately recommend her.

I don't recommend anyone to take this class. The tests are very hard and she does not give any extra points. During class she just reads whatever its on the power point. She does not explain anything. DONT TAKE MS SHEIL!!!
